title: Completed PE Summary - Arklow Sand
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Type: Cargo vessel
Date 23/03/05
Location of incident: "Long Sand" bank, near Boston
Incident Type: Grounding

Synopsis
The cargo vessel Arklow Sand departed the port of Boston, Lincolnshire, and had disembarked her pilot. Shortly after she grounded on the bank " Long Sand" in the wash.

Action taken
The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to the vessel's owners to emphasise company procedures regarding passage planning, monitoring of the vessel's position and the reporting of defects in ship critical equipment.

Category |   | Merchant | 
Type: |   | Cargo vessel | 
Date  |   | 23/03/05 | 
Location of incident: |   | "Long Sand" bank, near Boston | 
Incident Type: |   | Grounding | 

Synopsis  
The cargo vessel Arklow Sand departed the port of Boston, Lincolnshire, and had disembarked her pilot. Shortly after she grounded on the bank " Long Sand" in the wash.

Action taken  
The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to the vessel's owners to emphasise company procedures regarding passage planning, monitoring of the vessel's position and the reporting of defects in ship critical equipment.
